alert.note: Alert for South Central Utah; Southern Mountains (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 02 at 2:31PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Garfield and northeastern Kane Counties through 315 PM MDT... At 231 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 23 miles northwest of Lake Powell, or 28 miles south of Escalante, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of south central Garfield and northeastern Kane Counties. This includes Utah Route 12 between mile markers 70 and 75. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
